import { memo, useState } from 'react' import Select from 'react-select'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { english as englishStatus, vietnamese as vietnameseStatus } from '../../Languages/StatusTour' import { english as englishCategory, vietnamese as vietnameseCategory } from '../../Languages/TourCategory' import { english as englishType, vietnamese as vietnameseType } from '../../Languages/TourType' import { english as englishTable, vietnamese as vietnameseTable } from '../../Languages/TableTour'; import { AiOutlineSearch, AiOutlinePlus, AiOutlineEdit, AiOutlineDelete } from 'react-icons/ai' import { BsThreeDotsVertical } from 'react-icons/bs' import { HiOutlineEye } from 'react-icons/hi' import { Menu, MenuItem, MenuButton } from '@szhsin/react-menu'; import '@szhsin/react-menu/dist/index.css'; import '@szhsin/react-menu/dist/transitions/slide.css'; import axios from 'axios' import { toast } from 'react-toastify' function ListTourProduct({ languageSelected }) { const [searchName, setSearchName] = useState('') const [searchStatus, setSearchStatus] = useState(0) const [searchCategory, setSearchCategory] = useState(0) const [searchType, setSearchType] = useState(0) let optionsStatus = (languageSelected === 'EN' ? englishStatus : vietnameseStatus) let optionsCategory = (languageSelected === 'EN' ? englishCategory : vietnameseCategory) let optionsType = (languageSelected === 'EN' ? englishType : vietnameseType) let table = (languageSelected === 'EN' ? englishTable : vietnameseTable) return (
setSearchCategory(e.value)} placeholder='Accommodation' isSearchable={false} className='select-search-service select-type' options={optionsCategory} />
